snippet.title: 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far (Teaser)
snippet.description:
📢 ANNOUNCING: 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far! 📢

Commanders, the wait is over. Introducing 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far - the thrilling sequel to 8-Bit Armies! Venture into a world of voxel warfare, expansive campaigns, engaging multiplayer modes, and a fully destructible world.

🔹 Two Campaigns: Choose your side in a conflict spanning 30 missions.
🔹 Play With Friends: Conquer the campaign in Co-Op or join against others in huge maps supporting up to 8 armies.
🔹 An AI That Bytes Back: Computer opponents with multiple personalities to play with cooperatively or fight against.
🔹 Classic Base-Building: Wage war against unrelenting enemies whilst building your base to adapt and overcome.
🔹Blast It All To Bits: Destructible environments on a wide variety of maps where you can destroy cities, rebuild bridges, and enter the fray on land, sea, and air.
🔹Easy To Learn, Hard To Master: No previous experience necessary! Easy-to-understand modern-military units and structures let beginners jump right in. Whilst veteran players will learn how to master the fast-paced economy and unit abilities.
🔹Mod Support: Customize your game with community made maps, units, and game rules! You can even create whole new scenarios and game modes to play and share with others!
🔹A Legendary Legacy: From the same team that brought you RTS classics such as Star Wars: Empire at War™ , Universe at War™, Grey Goo™, and the Remastered Command & Conquer™ collection!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1439750
